name: Towers (itch) (Ben Sherratt)
description:
Towers was made over 7 months for the Open World Game Jam. Its sparse contents are a reflection of that limited development time. However, it is a complete story, and there is at least one ending. I would recommend playing it slowly, and not expecting too much.

Future Plans

I'm not sure what I want to do with this game, but I'm considering taking it forward in the future. You can follow me @btsherratt here, or on Twitter, if you're interested!
